title: Love Island host Sophie Monk's boyfriend Joshua Gross 'proposes in Fiji'
text:
Sophie Monk has made no secret of the fact she wants to marry her boyfriend Joshua Gross and start a family as soon as possible.

And it seems the 39-year-old Love Island Australia host could be walking down the aisle sooner rather than later.

As reported by NW magazine on Monday, Joshua is planning to propose to Sophie in Fiji, where he is keeping her company as she films Love Island.

'It's going to happen any day now!' Sophie Monk could be walking down the aisle sooner rather than later, with NW magazine reporting her boyfriend Joshua Gross is about to propose

'It's going to happen any day now,' said a source close to the couple.

The insider added that Joshua has planned the surprise proposal down to the very last detail.

'It'll be a romantic sunset date on the beach complete with a personalised three-course dinner of Sophie's favourite foods,' they said.

Will he pop the question? 'It's going to happen any day now,' said a source close to the couple

The source claimed the 40-year-old businessman even brought over Sophie's favourite champagne from Australia for the occasion.

Joshua will apparently present his girlfriend-of-one-year with an emerald-cut diamond ring.

'There's zero chance that Sophie will say no. She has been waiting for this day forever,' the insider said.

'There's zero chance that Sophie will say no!' According to an insider, Joshua is planning to propose to Sophie in Fiji, where he is keeping her company as she films Love Island

Sophie met Joshua on a flight from Europe to Australia last year after she finished filming season one of Love Island.

Following a whirlwind romance, Joshua relocated from America to the Gold Coast several months ago. The couple are now living together.

Sophie, who froze her eggs last year, hopes to have children 'down the track', and recently joked that she could be pregnant by next year's season of Love Island.
description: Sophie Monk has made no secret of the fact she wants to marry her boyfriend Joshua Gross and start a family as soon as possible.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
